snippet: Hundreds mourned the fighter Hector Camacho on Saturday in the stately East Harlem church he attended as a boy, and hundreds more cheered and shouted “Macho” when his coffin was carried out and loaded into a hearse afterward.
abstract: Hundreds of people gather at East Harlem church for funeral of former world boxing champion Hector Camacho.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds mourned the fighter Hector Camacho on Saturday in the stately East Harlem church he attended as a boy, and hundreds more cheered and shouted “Macho” when his coffin was carried out and loaded into a hearse afterward.
